alert.note: Alert for Walsh (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 23 at 10:37AM CDT until April 29 at 5:01PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Grand Forks ND has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in North Dakota... Forest River at Minto affecting Walsh County. .Ongoing river rises are anticipated over the next few days on the Forest river. Generally minor flooding is anticipated at this time. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON TO FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Forest River at Minto. * WHEN...From Sunday afternoon to Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 7.5 feet, Old Highway 81 is underwater. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 3.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 7.0 feet early Tuesday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 6.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
